      • bindState

        public void bindState(AccountState state)
        Description copied from interface: Account
        Bind state to an account. If nonce is less or equals to 0, nonce is set as 1. Remember, AccountState.address is not binded. Only nonce is binded.
        Specified by:
        bindState in interface Account
        Parameters:
        state - state to bind

      • setNonce

        public void setNonce(long nonce)
        Description copied from interface: Account
        Set nonce for account. If a passed nonce is less than 0, set as 0.
        Specified by:
        setNonce in interface Account
        Parameters:
        nonce - nonce to set
